title: SharePoint: Security - Granular conditional access policies via “Sensitivity Labels” for SharePoint Online sites
description: Admins will have the ability to use Azure AD conditional access policies to trigger multi-factor authentication (MFA), device, and location policies on a specific SharePoint site collection by simply attaching CA policies to a label. For example, the Top-Secret label can now have a conditional access policy that requires MFA when accessing a site. This feature for GCC-H and DoD environments tracked by the roadmap item 85979.
